pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Example PackageThis is a simple example package. You can use[Github-flavored Markdown](https://guides.github.com/features/mastering-markdown/)to write your content.# pip ```py -m pip install --upgrade pippy -m pip install --upgrade buildpy -m pip install --upgrade twine```# build```py -m build```# upload```py -m twine upload --repository pypi dist/*```
